seo.title: Privacy Policy | diBoaS
seo.description: Learn how diBoaS collects, uses, and protects your personal data. GDPR compliant.

header.title: Privacy Policy
header.intro: diBoaS ("we," "us," "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: diBoaS is a financial technology platform. We are the data controller for personal data collected through our website and services.

dreamMode.title: Dream Mode Data:
items: This data is stored locally on your device, not on our servers

whoWeShareWith.title: Who We Share Data With
whoWeShareWith.intro: We do not sell your personal data. We may share data with:

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers:
serviceProviders.content: Email services (to send communications), hosting providers, analytics tools

legal.title: Legal Requirements:
legal.content: When required by law or to protect our rights

whoWeShareWith.note: All service providers are contractually bound to protect your data.

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be transferred to countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA). We ensure appropriate safeguards through Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decisions.

items.duration: Until you unsubscribe or 2 years after last interaction

yourRights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)

rows.description: Request a copy of your personal data
Limit how we process your data
Receive your data in a portable format
Object to processing based on legitimate interest

yourRights.exerciseRights: To exercise your rights, email {email}. We will respond within 30 days.

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.content: If you believe we have violated your privacy rights, you may lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

security.title: Security
security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including:

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: diBoaS is not intended for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect data from children.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy. Material changes will be communicated via email or website notice.
